title: National Basketball Association highest-paid players ( salaries & endorsements ) 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Players on X-axis for 2 groups Salary, and Endorsements. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Earnings in million USD.

In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the highest Earnings in million USD 375.0 among the 2 groups and in Blake Griffin (Detroit Pistons), Endorsements had the lowest Earnings in million USD 7.0.
In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the maximum Earnings in million USD and it saw the lowest in Player Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) out of all 10 Players.
Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) had the biggest gap of 133.0 between the highest and lowest Earnings in million USD found for Salary.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Earnings in million USD on the Y-axis for 10 different Players for 2 groups Salary, and Endorsements that are presented on the X-axis.

Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) had the maximum Earnings in million USD among all 2 groups, and it was for Salary. The minimum Earnings in million USD was observed in Player Blake Griffin (Detroit Pistons) for Endorsements.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Players on X-axis for 2 groups Salary, and Endorsements. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Earnings in million USD.

In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the highest Earnings in million USD 375.0 among the 2 groups and in Blake Griffin (Detroit Pistons), Endorsements had the lowest Earnings in million USD 7.0.
In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the maximum Earnings in million USD and it saw the lowest in Player Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) out of all 10 Players.
Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) had the biggest gap of 133.0 between the highest and lowest Earnings in million USD found for Salary.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Earnings in million USD on the Y-axis for 10 different Players for 2 groups Salary, and Endorsements that are presented on the X-axis.

In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the highest Earnings in million USD 375.0 among the 2 groups and in Blake Griffin (Detroit Pistons), Endorsements had the lowest Earnings in million USD 7.0.
In Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors), Salary had the maximum Earnings in million USD and it saw the lowest in Player Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) out of all 10 Players.
Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) had the biggest gap of 133.0 between the highest and lowest Earnings in million USD found for Salary.

Among all 2 groups, Salary had the gap of 133.0 between the maximum and minimum Earnings in million USD observed in Player Stephen Curry (Golden State Warriors) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (Milwaukee Bucks) respectively.

On average, the Player LeBron James (Cleveland Cavaliers) had the highest Earnings in million USD for all 2 groups Salary, and Endorsements. Whereas Paul George (Oklahoma City Thunder) had the lowest average Earnings in million USD.
